name: Make It Click
description:
Our submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme of "Joined Together"

Help Jiggy, the boxboi puzzle piece, escape the toybox! Connect puzzle pieces to him to unlock new powers and get through the levels!

Thanks to everyone who worked on it:

  • Raulboo [Project-Management, Coding and Level Design]
  • Goncholito [Art]
  • SpaghettiLord1010 [Music & Sfx]
  • Raz [Coding]
  • Thmask [Coding and Level Design]

Everybody contributed to the overall game design decisions.

We worked hard to make it click and we're really digging it!

Pallete used: Mulfok32

Font Used: M04 Fatal Fury
